TEXT.TITLE: INVESTORS FILE PROXY FOR NEW HBO <HBOC> BOARD
TEXT.BODY: Andover Group said it filed preliminary proxy materials with the Securities and Exchange Commission to elect a slate of directors to HBO and Co's board at its April 30 annual meeting. Andover Group said it owns seven pct of HBO, a hospital information systems company.
